title: White House announces batch of new deals with elite law firms
summary: Four top law firms—Latham & Watkins, Simpson Thacher, Kirkland & Ellis, and A&O Shearman—are in talks with the Trump White House to deliver $500 million in pro bono work. In return, they would avoid sanctions aimed at firms with “DEI” programs or ties to Trump’s opponents
